title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added documentation for Copilot Memory, a new public preview feature enabling GitHub Copilot to store and utilize repository-specific knowledge.
Updated BYOK (Bring Your Own Key) documentation to include new providers: AWS Bedrock, Google AI Studio, and OpenAI-compatible providers.
Enhanced existing Copilot agent documentation (coding agent, code review) with sections on utilizing Copilot Memory for improved context.
Added a new image asset (`copilot-memory-list.png`) and integrated Copilot Memory into feature lists and setup guides.
Updated audit log event data and Dependabot security events documentation.
summary:
- Added documentation for Copilot Memory, a new public preview feature enabling GitHub Copilot to store and utilize repository-specific knowledge.
- Updated BYOK (Bring Your Own Key) documentation to include new providers: AWS Bedrock, Google AI Studio, and OpenAI-compatible providers.
- Enhanced existing Copilot agent documentation (coding agent, code review) with sections on utilizing Copilot Memory for improved context.
- Added a new image asset (`copilot-memory-list.png`) and integrated Copilot Memory into feature lists and setup guides.
- Updated audit log event data and Dependabot security events documentation.
generated_title: Introduce Copilot Memory and expand BYOK provider support

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added documentation for Copilot Memory, a new public preview feature enabling GitHub Copilot to store and utilize repository-specific knowledge.
- Updated BYOK (Bring Your Own Key) documentation to include new providers: AWS Bedrock, Google AI Studio, and OpenAI-compatible providers.
- Enhanced existing Copilot agent documentation (coding agent, code review) with sections on utilizing Copilot Memory for improved context.
- Added a new image asset (`copilot-memory-list.png`) and integrated Copilot Memory into feature lists and setup guides.
- Updated audit log event data and Dependabot security events documentation.

### Title
Introduce Copilot Memory and expand BYOK provider support
